abstract: Profile of California State University student Nohemi Gonzalez, who was fulfilling dream by studying design in Paris for semester, and is only American known to have died among 129 people killed in terrorist attacks; friends and family remember first-generation Mexican-American's ebullient, driven personality.
lead_paragraph: Nohemi Gonzalez, a student from California and the only American known to have died in the attacks, was representative of the young, ambitious people who flock to the French capital.

headline.main: Paris Victim Nohemi Gonzalez Was Pursuing Her Dreams in Design
headline.print_headline: American Was Pursuing Her Dreams of Design in Paris

snippet: Nohemi Gonzalez, a student from California and the only American known to have died in the attacks, was representative of the young, ambitious people who flock to the French capital.
